array.string: To move text while editing, hold down Command (⌘) and Option and drag the text.
If you pick a font from the font panel (Edit→Font→Show Fonts) while not editing, it will be used as the default font for all new text entries.
To export a FormulatePro document as a PDF, choose File→Print, click the PDF button and choose Save As PDF
FormulatePro can zoom in on a PDF far more than many PDF viewers
